# Workflow

> These notes generally assume that you'll be doing some sort of linear regression, 
> but the first couple of steps in your workflow are applicable to most analyses
> and will help you figure out what kind of analysis you want to do.

## Overview

1. Decide on your question(s)
  - Helps guide exploration and models
2. Preliminary data exploration
  - Helps determine answers to questions and guide model development
3. Decide on a model
4. Run model
5. Check model diagnostics
6. Interpret model
